tab.bettertab.keybind.title: Better Tab
tab.bettertab.config.title: BetterTab
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.scrolli: What scrolling type should be used
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.max_wid: The maximum width of the player list
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.max_col: The maximum width of a column
The maximum height of a column
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.render_: Whether the header is to be rendered
Whether the footer is to be rendered
Whether heads are to be rendered
Whether the ping is to be rendered
Whether badges are to be rendered
Whether the scoreboard number is to be rendered
Whether the scroll indicator is to be rendered
When the column index should be rendered
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.use_num: If numerical ping should be used, otherwise normal will be used
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.force_c: If the client player is to be first on the player list
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.save_sc: If the scroll is to be saved
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.scroll_: If you can use the mouse to scroll on tab
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.hotbar_: Allows you to scroll in your hotbar, if there's only one page.
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.empty_l: The color of the line on empty entries
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.no_ping: The color when you have no ping
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.low_pin: The color when you have low ping
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.medium_: The color when you have medium ping
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.high_pi: The color when you have high ping
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.refresh: The time inbetween updates of the playerlist
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.use_exa: Whether or not examples should be used
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.example: The name of the example. "%d" to get the number.
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.numeric: The format of the numerical ping text. "%d" to get the ping.
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.medium_: At what ping the color switches to "medium".
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.high_pi: At what ping the color switches to "high". To be higher than medium.
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.scrolli: How fast the scroll indicators blink.
tab.bettertab.config.option.desc.scorebo: The format of the scoreboard health text. "%d" to get the health.
